T02D3089:186b-0: @186b * // bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te /
T02D3089:187a-1: dur khrod kyi thal ba dang /
T02D3089:187a-2: chu phar 'gram tshur 'gram gyi sa las bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D3089:187a-3: 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar bris pa'i mthar che ge
T02D3089:187a-4: mo'i 'byung po m'a ra ya nan bya ba bkod
T02D3089:187a-5: de / de'i snying gar bcug nas de la bdag
T02D3089:187a-6: gi thugs las phyag rgya'i tshogs spros pas bsgrub par
T02D3089:187a-7: bya ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnga
T02D3089:187a-9: bkug ste gzugs brnyan la bcug ste /
T02D3089:187a-10: bcings nas la chas dril te gres mas dkris la /
T02D3089:187a-11: thod pa'am kham phor kha sbyar sar pa ru bcug ste /
T02D3089:187a-14: legs ldan drag po la sogs pa la gtor ma
T02D3089:187a-15: byin nas 'byung po 'di dag gi dbang du gyis
T02D3089:187a-19: mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og dong gru gsum du bcug la /
T02D3089:187a-20: bye ma'am tsher mas bkad nas rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan te /
T02D3089:187a-21: bskal par mi thar bar bsam mo //
T02D3089:187a-22: bgegs gzir ba ni gzugs brnyan snga ma ltar ram /
T02D3089:187a-25: de'i mthar mar che ge mo m'a ra ya btags te bris nas /
T02D3089:187a-26: gtor ma snga ma ltar byin te /
T02D3089:187a-28: dbang po legs ldan la sogs pas gnod par byed pa'i 'byung po 'di choms shig ces bskul nas /
T02D3089:187a-29: phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rang dbang med par snga ma ltar bkug bcings nas /
T02D3089:187a-30: thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags dang yungs kar /
T02D3089:187a-31: phur bu dang ral gri dang bcas pas gzir cing tha mar mnan pa'am bsreg par bya'o //
T02D3089:187a-32: yang na tha mar mna' chu blud la gtang bar bya'o //
